column8: At this restaurant, choose between three tables in the elegant, contemporary-style purple Stube, and another three in the more rustic, historic and romantic Stube. Wherever you choose to sit, you’ll enjoy creative, sophisticated dishes that will particularly appeal to anyone keen on innovative and imaginative cuisine. At the helm, chef Mattia Baroni has an unusual background, having moved from computer studies to working in renowned restaurants around the world.
